description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Investigate This:  The Scourge of the Scarecrow!   This is a story-focused mystery game where you'll experience the thrill of cracking your first big case.  To enhance the adventure, you can play as either a male or female protagonist and choose from multiple story paths to reach the gripping finale.
description.short: Investigate This:  The Scourge of the Scarecrow!   This is a story-focused mystery game where you'll experience the thrill of cracking your first big case.  To enhance the adventure, you can play as either a male or female protagonist and choose from multiple story paths to reach the gripping finale.
